title: Bagrat II of Klarjeti
text:
<a href="Prince">Prince</a> Bagrat () (died in 988) was a <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgian</a> royal prince ("<a href="batonishvili">batonishvili</a>") of the <a href="Bagrationi%20dynasty">Bagrationi dynasty</a> of <a href="Tao-Klarjeti">Tao-Klarjeti</a>.
Prince Bagrat was son of <a href="Sumbat%20II%20of%20Klarjeti">Sumbat II of Klarjeti</a> and father of <a href="Sumbat%20III%20of%20Klarjeti">Sumbat III of Klarjeti</a> and George. George was the father of <a href="Demetrius%20of%20Klarjeti">Demetrius of Klarjeti</a>.
He died forty days after his father, in 988.
